title: COVID-19 - Somali Preparedness Materials

summary: This handbook was based on the guidelines for prevention, control, and diagnosis and treatment of the National Health Commission of China. It is the result of two months of practical treatment, and summarizes applicable methods for treating COVID-19 patients – especially critically ill patients – while serving as a point of reference for other countries battling the pandemic.
title: Handbook of COVID-19 Preventionand Treatment
